title: S14 Ep20: The Girls Are Gone
itunes:title: The Girls Are Gone
description:
BEYOND the Darkness celebrates it's 100th episode of True Crime Tuesday by airing some of it's best episodes for you this weekend!!

On Sunday's episode...

TRUE CRIME TUESDAY is turned on their ear with the case of The Girls are Gone!
We find another horrific story within a story on today's episode with special guests Allison Mann & Michael Brodkorb. PLUS Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals!

The Girls Are Gone is the true story of two sisters who went missing, the father who kept searching, and the adults who conspired to keep the truth hidden. This is an emotional rollercoaster for Dave as they examine this disturbing case and quickly a story within the story unfolds that leaves Dave in an emotional upheaval. Do Not Miss this episode.

Visit their site: http://missinginminnesota.com/

Get their book here: https://amazon.com

Support our sponsors for great deals!
